name: MMAI
description:
MMAI is a combat AI powered by machine learning.

To use MMAI, make sure to select it in Settings (see Screenshots tab).

You can read more about this project here.
author: Simeon Manolov <s.manolloff@gmail.com>

1.1: Add comment regarding temperature in mmai-settings.json
1.2: Fixed issue on crowded battlefields (30+ units)
Improved model inference speed via dynamic inputs
